name: Lair of the Three-Headed Hydra
description:
The very first Bitsy game I ever worked on, getting to the last room, and abandoning it to make The Forest At Night. Always thought it was a shame I never finished it, so here it is, a year in the making! (Give or take.)

A tragic tale of hubris and denial.

ENTER the lair. FACE the dangers. BATTLE the hydra???
